text: Martin Hloušek (born 2 October 1979 in Kosice) is a Slovak football player who currently plays for the Slovak 3. liga club FC Lokomotíva Košice. ==Career== ===Club=== In January 2011, he joined Wisła Płock.Martin Hlousek piłkarzem Wisły Płock 14 January 2011, 1liga.com.pl ==References== ==External links== * * * Guardian Football Category:1979 births Category:Living people Category:Slovak footballers Category:FC VSS Košice players Category:MFK Ružomberok players Category:MŠK Rimavská Sobota players Category:MŠK Púchov players Category:Czech First League players Category:1. title: Martin Hloušek
